programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: Ottawa visits Winnipeg. Facing a 22-1 deficit following a fumble-six to end the first quarter, the Redblacks rallied to beat the Argonauts 46-42 in a Week 10 thriller in Toronto. Ottawa quarterback Dru Brown threw for 373 yards and five touchdowns.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: Edmonton hosts Toronto. The 2024 season was largely one to forget for Edmonton, but the Elks capped the year with a 31-30 win over the eventual Grey Cup champion Argonauts in Week 21. The Elks won the match via a thrilling walk-off rouge in overtime.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Roughriders (7-1) return from their second bye of 2025 for a game with a fellow division leader in the Tiger-Cats (6-3). Hamilton's six-game win streak ended at home against BC in Week 10. Saskatchewan pushed past Hamilton 28-23 in Week 2.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: Week 11 wraps up with BC (4-5) hosting Montreal (5-4). The Lions escaped Quebec with a 21-20 triumph in Week 5, running their win streak over the Alouettes to five games. James Butler (BC) entered the week leading the CFL with 704 rushing yards.
